languages.text: И прояснилась ее душа, и открылись глаза тени. Сомнения были изгнаны, а в словах госпо{mf|дина|жи} прочитала она истину.
And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.
languages.original_text: И прояснилась ее душа, и открылись глаза тени. Сомнения были изгнаны, а в словах госпо{mf|дина|жи} прочитала она истину.

traits.locale_text: And there was clarity in her soul, and the shadow's eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.
And there was clarity in her soul, and the shadow's eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

languages.text: Und es lag Klarheit in der Seele des Schattens, und ihre Augen öffneten sich. Ihre Zweifel waren gebannt, und sie erkannte die Wahrheit in den Worten {mf|ihres Lords|ihrer Lady}.
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

traits.locale_text: Und es lag Klarheit in der Seele des Schattens, und ihre Augen öffneten sich. Ihre Zweifel waren gebannt, und sie erkannte die Wahrheit in den Worten {mf|ihres Lords|ihrer Lady}.

languages.text: Y el alma de la sombra se aclaró, y sus ojos se abrieron. Sus dudas quedaron desterradas al ver la verdad de las palabras de su señor{mf||a}.
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

traits.locale_text: Y el alma de la sombra se aclaró, y sus ojos se abrieron. Sus dudas quedaron desterradas al ver la verdad de las palabras de su señor{mf||a}.

languages.text: そして影の魂に明晰さが宿り、彼女の目が開かれた。疑念は消え去り、主人の言葉に真実を垣間見た。
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

traits.locale_text: そして影の魂に明晰さが宿り、彼女の目が開かれた。疑念は消え去り、主人の言葉に真実を垣間見た。

languages.text: 影子的灵魂变得清澈起来，她睁开了双眼。她心中的疑虑消失了，她从主人的话语中窥见了真理。
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

traits.locale_text: 影子的灵魂变得清澈起来，她睁开了双眼。她心中的疑虑消失了，她从主人的话语中窥见了真理。

languages.text: L'âme de l'ombre fut alors emplie de clarté et ses yeux s'ouvrirent. Ses doutes furent chassés, et elle entrevit la vérité dans les paroles de {mf|son seigneur|sa seigneure}.
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.

traits.locale_text: L'âme de l'ombre fut alors emplie de clarté et ses yeux s'ouvrirent. Ses doutes furent chassés, et elle entrevit la vérité dans les paroles de {mf|son seigneur|sa seigneure}.

languages.text: Gölgenin ruhunda berraklık vardı. Gözleri açıldı. Kuşkuları defedildi ve {mf|lordunun|leydisinin} sözlerindeki hakikati bir anlığına da olsa gördü.
languages.original_text: And there was clarity in the shadow's soul, and her eyes opened. Her doubt was banished, and she glimpsed the truth in her {mf|lord|lady}'s words.
